channel.title: An Untitled Blog
channel.description: Recent content on An Untitled Blog

item.title: Subdomain Change
item.description: TLDR Even though it’s only been three months since I created my blog here, I’m going to change the domain from www.mecca1.net to nate.mecca1.net instead. Nothing’s should break, www.mecca1.net will forward to nate.mecca1.net for now. Still, if you’re following me through RSS or you have my site bookmarked it might be worth swapping out the URL. Longer Update My domain predates my blog by about six years, so when I created my blog a few months ago I opted to just use the www subdomain.
